name: Survival Zombies The Inverted Evolution
description: Survival Zombies is a bloody chaotic survival first person shooter that pits heavily armed players against humanity's greatest fear - hordes of undead.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 (32 bit) / Vista Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2,3 GHz Intel Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 5 GB available space
